CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Burtonville?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Burtonville is arc {Hannah}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Quinnview?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Quinnview is arc {Lake Sherry}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Lake Sherry} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Lake Sherry to Burtonville in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Hannah to Quinnview in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Hannah to Burtonville in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Burtonville and Quinnview in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Burtonville and Quinnview is {169}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Quinnview and Burtonville in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Quinnview and Burtonville is {85}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Hannah?
SC.A: The total flow output from Hannah is {730}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Burtonville?
SC.A: The total flow input by Burtonville is {939}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 550? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {552} from {Lake Sherry} to {Burtonville}, a flow of {605} from {Burtonville} to {Lake Sherry}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 171? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {85} from {Quinnview} to {Burtonville}, a flow of {169} from {Burtonville} to {Quinnview}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 299 and 365? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {302} from {Hannah} to {Burtonville}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Hannah to Quinnview or from Quinnview to Hannah?
NC.A: The flow from {Hannah} to {Quinnview} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Lake Sherry to Quinnview, from Hannah to Burtonville, or from Burtonville to Quinnview?
NC.A: The flow from {Lake Sherry} to {Quinnview} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Hannah}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Burtonville} and {Lake Sherry}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Burtonville, Arc Lake Sherry, Arc Quinnview, Arc Hannah}.
